text:
"Archer" is an American adult animated black comedy, action adventure television series. The series airs on FX. A preview for the series aired on September 17, 2009. The first season started on January 14, 2010. Aisha Tyler plays Lana. Jessica Walter plays Malory Archer.
This television series has a rating of TV-MA, usually for foul language and violence. Sometimes there is also nudity.
